scan_metadata.description: codebuild - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check project logging
check_functions.description: Checks if logging is enabled for CodeBuild project

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Script to scan for secrets in variables
check_functions.description: Ensures no secrets are present in project variables

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check project age
check_functions.description: Checks if project is older than 90 days

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check S3 logs encryption
check_functions.description: Checks if S3 logs are encrypted for project

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Script to scan repo URL for sensitive credentials
check_functions.description: Ensures source repo URL has no sensitive credentials

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check user-controlled buildspec
Code Executable - API call to check report group export encryption
check_functions.description: Checks if report group export is encrypted

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Script to check secure coding practices
check_functions.description: Checks for secure coding practices in project

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Script to check code review
check_functions.description: Checks if code review is performed for project

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check vulnerability scan
check_functions.description: Checks if vulnerability scan is enabled for project
